import get from'lodash/get';/**
 * Get the organizations details from the user context.
 *
 * @param {object} userContext The user context
 */export var getUserOrganizations=function getUserOrganizations(userContext){var activeOrgUuid=get(userContext,'activeOrgUuid',null);var organizations=get(userContext,'accessibleOrgs',{});var orgsUuids=Object.values(organizations);var accessibleOrgs=Object.keys(organizations).reduce(function(listAccessibleOrgs,organizationName,index){var org={uuid:orgsUuids[index],name:organizationName};listAccessibleOrgs.push(org);return listAccessibleOrgs;},[]);var activeOrg=accessibleOrgs.find(function(org){return org.uuid===activeOrgUuid;});var hasAccessibleOrgs=accessibleOrgs.length>0;return{hasAccessibleOrgs:hasAccessibleOrgs,accessibleOrgs:accessibleOrgs,activeOrg:activeOrg};};
